structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXVIII. COMMISSION ON ETHICS AND PUBLIC TRUST

law.catch_line: Applicability of Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance.

text.section:
Sec. 2-1070. Applicability of Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance.
The Miami-Dade County Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance, of the Code of Miami-Dade County, Florida, shall be applicable to the members and staff of the Ethics Commission.
